name: Evil Dungeon
description:
Evil Dungeon is a 2D Dungeon Crawler game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44.

You find yourself all alone in the darkness of the Evil Dungeon. Use your flashlight to illuminate your path as you collect items, avoid obstacles and traps, and try to escape. Beware the Demon Gates as they cost health to pass. Be mindful of your route or you’ll pay the ultimate price…your life!

Controls:

Walk: WASD
Flashlight: Mouse (LMB to lock)
Return to Menu: Escape
